name: instrumental
content:
instrumental adjective
(INFLUENCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ after verb ] formal If someone or something is instrumental in a process, plan, or system, that person or thing is one of the most important influences in causing it to happen: instrumental in She was instrumental in bringing about the prison reform act.

instrumental adjective
(MUSIC)
involving only musical instruments, and no singing: instrumental music an instrumental piece/arrangement

instrumental adjective
(TOOL)
important in causing something to happen: As secretary of state, he was instrumental in the creation of NATO.
